channel.title: The Girls Uninterrupted on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in The Girls Uninterrupted on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Toenails, mingy eggs, daytime soaps and a sweet baby angel. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Honestly, when the three of us are in the same room, the wheels completely fall off. I don't even know how to describe this podcast - it goes from clipping your toenails, to buffet breakfasts, to confirmation of a moustache, to a Slippery Susan and rounds out with a sweet baby angel. We wish you well. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Big news (but low key), men sitting down to pee, and soup. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Gracie may very well have low key slipped some news into the minutes today... We probably talk for way too long about the mechanics of a man sitting down to pee. We wonder who goes to a restaurant and orders soup?! PDA at a concert? Mouthwash? See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Strapless Bras, sickbags and lava lamps. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Caitlin thinks there is indeed a good strapless bra that exists. Have you ever spewed in a sick bag? Remember K-Bars? They were a time weren't they? What about lava lamps? Did you have one or were you not allowed? All the big chats today folks. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Mercury in the microwave, dresses over pants, and the "Xmas window". | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Mercury is in the microwave folks but Gracie reckons Mercury Energy owes us money and quite frankly we are here for it. Are you climbing in the Christmas window this year? Or are you staying out of it? Dresses over pants. No. And when your mate is being rude to your husband - what do you do? See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Fiji!! Cute or hot or healthy? Flicking nipples and badly-packed mussels. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Not only are the three of us in the same room together, but it's our first podcast back together in about six weeks (she's a biggie)!! We debrief about the glorious trip to Fiji, all thanks to the wonderful team at Tourism Fiji - we had a stunning time! Caitlin tells us something she regularly does on the couch and we weren't expecting that. Do you like being called cute or hot or healthy?

item.title: Shaving above the knee, thrifting and nipple bras | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Caitlin and Gracie fumble their way through another episode this week without B, who will be back next week! They talk about going make-up-free, Celine Dion, being back on the dating apps, Christmas Trees and losing yourself after having children. Also, Caitlin may be a creep at the gym… See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Caitlin’s European Adventures, Playing with Fire and Belly Buttons. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Caitlin is back and sharing all of her European stories (um, hot waiters…) baby travel tips from Gracie, daycare fun, belly buttons, hair ties and a bunch of other stuff including a listener tip on those pesky spag bol tupperware containers. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Solo female traveling yarns - with Alexa West | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description This week's guest host is an absolute VIBE. Over a decade ago, Alexa West boarded a plane with $200 in her pocket and zero travel experience under her belt. She's now a best selling travel author, has traveled all over the world and built a 6-figure travel empire. Her mission: to show women how we can travel and work abroad without having a boyfriend or a big bank account.

item.title: The Beckhams, single pity, a surprise period and Stewart Island - Brodie's minutes. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Look, Caitlin's in Ibiza being fabulous and Gracie is having a beautiful family holiday, but I still had some minutes! So I said them haha. Enjoy! Brodie x See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: The "boyfriend experience", designer bags and running poles - with Morgan Penn | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description She's a juicy episode today as somatic sexologist Morgan Penn joins Brodie and we go everywhere from hairy or waxed or lasered, to getting out of a rut, to dealing with break ups, to normalising the slut era, to learning about the "Morgan Penn Boyfriend Experience" and then somehow we end on running poles. Yes, they are a thing thank you. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Holding hands, the "Pandemic Skip" and boy math. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description The fantastic Tegan Yorwarth joins Brodie for the week and it's a real rollercoaster of yarns. Think Taylor Swift, Kim V Kourtney, having babies or not, politics and voting, Meg the Great White Shark from Stewart Island, buying houses, taking supplements because health, boy math and the "pandemic skip". Told you it goes everywhere! xxx See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: We need to talk about Kevin (and stool samples and RARO and naughty kids)... | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Caitlin has pissed off the Jonas Brothers diehard fans by a a single Instagram caption... We reminisce about RARO (does it still exist??) and going out and doing naughty things as teenagers. Brodie has a traumatic experience with a stool sample. Turns out she's not the only one struggling with stools this week (Frank's Corner)... Gracie gives some amazing advice to a woman who's just found out she's pregnant and has mixed feelings about it.

item.title: A Girlie Roman Empire, Sydney Mara and, Crocs vs Birks, UP THE WAHS. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description UP THE WAHS! The girls discuss the Roman Empire trend (because it's actually bloody funny) and realise that a lot of the girl versions are quite grim! Brodie gives a Sydney Marathon debrief. Caitlin is in the departure lounge. Gracie has to make a HUGE decision... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Woman wees, BJs and chats, shoplifting and chutney. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Brodie's back and there's a lot to unpack from Bali... Gracie had to deal with Frank shoplifting and choking in one day. Caitlin is trying to get "pissfit" for Europe so we tell her that hangovers aren't the same over there. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Kevin Jonas, Brain Worms and Short Kings | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description B is having a much-deserved break in Bali, so Gracie and Caitlin have taken the reins on this week's episode! Caitlin is oddly into Timothée and Kylie, Gracie has unlocked a new fear of worms on the brain, and they are both making sure they are enrolled to vote... Plus they discover just how lame they truly are with their coffee orders and how much they enjoy long walks.

item.title: Zoe Marshall Uninterrupted | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We are so excited to have Zoe Marshall on the podcast this week, this is an episode you will NOT want to miss. Zoe has been a broadcaster for over 12 years, and is the host and creator of the hugely successful podcast The Deep. From diving into Gloriavale, interviewing terminally ill parents, a madam, a lactating porn star and a man who has sex with dolls - there is quite possibly no one Zoe wouldn’t interview.

item.title: Taranaki Hardcore, Beekeeping age and the Unicorn... | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Gracie spills the tea on all the sexy towns and regions of Aotearoa... We learn about "beekeeping age" and Caitlin is not impressed... We hear about what it means to be "the unicorn" and WOW. And the girls are divided over when you should pack for a holiday - the night before or weeks out? See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Frank, Frank, Football, Furtado and rats and bins. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Frank Green is at it again... Nelly Furtado is BACK and we are so here for it! We're also here for the absolute raging success of the FIFA Women's World Cup - how bloody good! Baby Frank is in his poo era... Apparently we are in for a Rat Girl Summer... And possibly the smoothest segue from rats to new green food scrap bins... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Baby Crocs, Greasy sluts, RSA pours and Snags. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Would you catch the bus after a one night stand? Frank's got baby Crocs and Brodie's ready to stage an intervention. We discuss our RSA drink of choice and reminisce about the days of working in radio and cooking thousands of Sizzler sausages (pretty sure it's not the first time we've talked about it but my goodness it's a memory). Plus we are OUTRAGED at Barcelona. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Aliens and sun bears, self waxing, kid carparks and virginity. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description If you're looking for in-depth analysis into UFO's you won't find it here. Same with sun bears. But Gracie can offer some self-waxing advice. Caitlin can tell you how to celebrate your birthday all by yourself. And Brodie can offer you some pearls of wisdom one week after the great yoni mapping of 2023... Also, an amazing listener question which makes us discuss "losing your virginity" and how it really needs to shut up and just not be a societal expectation.

item.title: The great yoni mapping of 2023... | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Brodie's yoni mapping has happened and we are here to debrief all about it - it was an incredible experience! Plus we debrief all the tour goss, check in with Caitlin who's getting her health back, and Gracie's got a rolling Frank which is another challenge for our gorgeous Mum! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Skims, boundaries, theft, old love, 1000 Margs. Live from Auckland! | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Well, the last show in Auckland did not disappoint! We've had an absolute blast on this tour, and hope everyone who's been listening has been enjoying the episodes - we best see ya'll at the next tour which we are already thinking about (after 300 hours sleep haha). A busy show this week with a full Skims report, a chat about boundaries, someone stole something, and we debrief about the 1000 Margaritas we had the week before and the tea around that.

item.title: Escorts, Yoni mapping, Pet Day. The Wellington Show! | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Wellington did NOT disappoint and nothing was off limits! We discuss escorts, and how it might be a better idea than dating apps. Someone's getting a Yoni map this week... Gracie surprises us with a gift, and Caitlin lands a slick nursing joke (LOLOLOL). See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Dick amnesia, a lost tooth, Nigella Pawson and a Gorilla (LIVE FROM Ōtautahi Christchurch) | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We had an absolute blast on the first stop of the tour in beautiful Ōtautahi Christchurch. Thank you so much to Novotel Christchurch Airport for having us - it was an amazing event and we appreciate your support. She sure was a busy show, covering things like dick amnesia, some pretty hilarious animal stories (cats and gorillas), and a missing tooth. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Bonus episode with Real Estate Agent Courtney Pero | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to this extra special bonus episode with Courtney Pero - a Real Estate Agent based in Ōtautahi Christchurch with Harcourts. There’s always so much noise around the housing market, whether you’re buying or selling, thinking, freaking out, dreaming - it can get very overwhelming and a bit scary… We’ve got some of your questions you’ve sent through so thank you lovely listeners. This episode is brought to you by Courtney Pero.

item.title: Jason Momoa, Kombucha and cucumbers. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description She's a bit of a shorter episode this week but all our remaining minutes will be carried over to our FIRST LIVE SHOW WOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOO!!! (Which ya'll will get next Monday and that will be the episode for the week FYI). But don't worry, there's still time to talk about Jason Momoa. And Kombucha. And cucumbers. And Frank graduating!!!! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Dry white wine, Mancession, Mount Dads, beige flags. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We're back and we realise that we are indeed of an age where we enjoy a DRY WHITE WINE (can only be said in the voice though). Nevermind the recession, what about how many negative quarters in a row we've dealt with in regards to the man shortage (mancession - see what we did there). Mount Dads - IYKYK Beige flags. Doggies in the bed. Soup for life.

item.title: Dame Caitlin, blue vulvas, Frank Green and dog poo-gate. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We learn all about blue vulvas today! Brodie has another rant about Frank Green water bottles (I mean she hardly ever rants) AND a hot, steaming, fresh dog poo update. Gracie is dicing with danger aka cutting Pumpkins - why are they so RUTHLESS to deal with? Caitlin cried during The Little Mermaid and we fully support that but we CANNOT get around a tomato bene (you'll understand when you hear it right at the end).

item.title: The wing, white socks, bra hooks, race bibs and WOFs. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Do you suck on the chicken wing? Are you down with the black tights and white socks trend that's back? Do you hook your bra up properly? Should you be able to use marathons to find love and is the race bib the answer? Should you make sure your car is clean before getting a WOF? SO MANY QUESTIONS! We bloody love your support, and would love it even more if you like and subscribe the show wherever you listen to it (subscribe on Apple, follow on Spotify).

item.title: Basic bitches for the win, flirt school and fake emergencies. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We've come to the conclusion that we are indeed basic bitches (yes, just today haha) and we actually really happy with it. Brodie gives an update on Flirt School and while it was super fun and there was learnings...it's still a grim outlook out there folks. We urge Caitlin to do some DM sliding. Gracie is in a nude nail era and is also having a wild time on the Apple Ciders and we are here for it.

item.title: Herpes, Hickeys and Hard Eggs. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We're pretty sure herpes, hickeys and hard eggs were talked about in the first five minutes but it'll give you an idea of the tone of the podcast today... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Slutty takeaways, pub grime dudes and Masturbation May. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We've got a new term to describe the various levels of takeaways and we think it'll stick. It's Masturbation May in case you didn't know, but shit it's high maintenance. Are you into dudes that have that "pub grime" look? We have a dating app update, and some wise advice for one of our single sisters! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Met Gala f*ckery, a town called Dildo, and a couple of rebirths. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description You best believe we dive into every orifice of the Met Gala. We love it, we hate it, we love to love and hate it at the same time ok?!?!?! Caitlin is having a much deserved holiday, but the other two have essentially had a rebirth! Brodie gives a debrief on the Routeburn Classic. Gracie had a gorgie night out. And a dick-shaped iceberg discovered by a man from Dildo.

item.title: Captions, a death in Vegas and slick hair and berms. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Gracie thinks the only thing AI might be good for is coming up with our punishing social media captions. Brodie thinks she knows where her final resting place is. Caitlin learns what a berm is. Another quick Coachella debrief. Gumboot tea, cauliflower and white cowboy boots. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Undies as pants, Barbie and an emotional dump. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Undies as pants for fashion? We possibly spent way too long on this. Barbie the movie better have the sex scenes we created when we had Barbies or we're not watching... There's also some emotional dumping in this episode... And the trickiest listener question to date... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Charisma, Our Penny, the Honky Donkey, and Mortgages! | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description She's absolutely chocka this week! We learn where the rizz actually comes from. Two rockstars feature on the podcast this week, Penny Lancaster (aka Rod Stewart's wife) and of course, the Honky Donkey at the Fairlie show... Plus we catch up with Jenna from Mortgages with Jenna, to answer some very helpful questions about buying a house, getting a mortgage, basically all that overwhelming adulting stuff we all need to know about!

item.title: Adult eggs, vegan poos and cheating boyfriends. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Caitlin is 32 and still gets an Easter Egg delivered to her door at Easter. There are hot cross buns that cost SIX DOLLARS. We possibly will offend the entire vegan community this week... We want to cancel toilet spray. And how to deal with cheating boyfriends. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Ugly pashes, pub pashes, shrugs and miso soup. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description There was an ugly pash this week and it got us reminiscing about pub pashes. Why are shrugs creeping their way back in? Is miso soup overrated, underrated or perfectly rated? *note we had technical difficulties on this record, so apologies for the audio sounding different. XXX See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Frank's first episode! Crocs, fireballs, paper towels and Marlon Williams. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Frank is LIVE in the studio for his first podcast and he NAILED it!! We break the news to Gracie that Crocs are dangerous. Don't mix tequila and fireball shots. Are paper towels an important part of your kitchen life? And do you wash your tea towels with your clothes?! Very wholesome today as you can see! X See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Tuesdays, roasting, footpaths and hasselback potatoes. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We've decided Tuesday is the worst day of the week...hence why we normally record on a Wednesday! But anyway here we are. We discuss the merits of a good roast (both types haha). Footpath etiquette. Josh Emett and his hasselback potatoes. Riding in cars with boys. Paying to get into clubs. Flying fried rice. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: HARRY!!!!! And hearses, mom parks and 2nd earrings. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description The gang is all back together and IN THE SAME ROOM TOGETHER!! You best believe there's a BIG Harry debrief. Gracie got second ear piercings and we all want second ear piercings. Brodie's back from off the grid and off the grid was good, and Caitlin's made a skin decision. And, are there other uses for a hearse?!?!?!?! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Mom chat with Meg | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Meg Mansell joins Caitlin and Gracie to talk of life as a new (ish) mum. We talk relationships, sleeping separately, going back to work, nipples, expectations, in-laws, all the good stuff. It’s all there even though we only a short amount of time, we love Meg! B is back next week, see you then! xx See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Milk ducts, sourdough, boogers and shoey’s | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description B is off the grid for 2 weeks, so Gracie and Caitlin are fumbling their way through the agenda this week! Gracie shares more on the beautiful ups and downs of breastfeeding and newborns and brings a great yet, slightly disturbing game Caitlin has a hot tip on heatless curls and realises she knows nothing at all about Europe and geography And another amazing life update from another beautiful mama x

item.title: A poonami, front and top loaders, and ssssssshhhhhhhhhhh. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Gracie arrives to the poddy fresh from dealing with a Frank poonami which makes Brodie reminisce about the times she poonami'd (SHE WAS A BABY TOO FYI). Caitlin learns about the difference between a top and a front... Does ssssshhhhhh offend you? Plus, an AMAZING life update from one of our wonderful listeners. xxx See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Gracie's back! Plus Lazy Susan's and Apple Watches... | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We have the most special catch up with Gracie, who shares such a beautiful, honest story about how Frank arrived in this world! Meanwhile, thanks to the inspiration from our amazing listeners - Caitlin is slowly being convinced to shoot her shot at the gym, and Brodie's poised and ready to go too (not sure who with though haha). And we go hard against Apple Watches... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Polyamory, manifesting dreams and gym dates. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Monogamy, polyamory, open relationships, a sly threesome when you're in a relationship. What do you guys think of it all?! We are fascinated by the different ways in which people operate. Also, STFU if you have a problem with Sam Smith celebrating who they want to be. Caitlin and Brodie realise they urge dreams on, but sometimes it gets out of hand. And TALK TO THE BOY AT THE GYM!

item.title: Pillow partners, lion heads and peaking at high school. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Are pillows the next best bed partner? Lion-heads as fashion - give us strength. Aire as a baby name - give us strength. Did you "peak" at high school? And what to do when all your life plans blow up in your face. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Saying no, eggs, the rizz and black boots. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description HAPPY NEW YEAR!! It's just Caitlin and Brodie because our beautiful new Mum Gracie is at home with the most glorious wee boy Frank and they are doing so well, we are so happy for them and hoping our G is trying to get as much sleep as possible! It's a real delightful catch up about all the bits and bobs that happened over the silly season. That includes: the egg shortage, a one night stand, expired Christmas ham, black boots and festivals, and a broken flying fox.

item.title: See you on the other side (with a new baby)!!! | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Can you believe the next time we record a podcast Gracie will have a wee baby boy! We are so excited and happy for Gracie and Ali, and know they are going to be the most wonderful parents! We recap the year, all the good, the bad, and the bits in between! And share some highlights and a couple of lowlights. Thank you for your amazing support again this year, it has truly meant the world to us, we LOVE YOU!

item.title: Hey Siri, pedal pushers, plastic cheese and Uber Drivers... | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description A MONSTER OF AN EPISODE... White Lotus, Love Island, Harry and Meghan. Hair extensions and pedal pushers. Milking boobies, plastic cheese and asparagus. And, Uber Drivers. And that doesn't even scratch the surface... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Le Snaks, ultra marathons and compliments. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description The great Kepler Challenge debrief after Brodie completes her first ultra marathon! We discuss all the great food we've lost this year. Should we be giving more compliments/feeding the egos when we're on the dating apps? Caitlin is contemplating spending New Year's Eve alone... Gracie had a Catfish marathon on her birthday and we are absolutely here for it. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Hard launches, Bridget Jones and fruit sticks. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Gosh there's quite a bit of brain fry in this episode - we have no doubt you'll hear it - we blame the end of year f*ckery. Are you a hard launch or soft launch type of person? Do you hate when someone tells you you look like someone? And what do you put on your fruit sticks? See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Farts + Poos, refunds and more poos. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Gosh there is a lot of poo chat this week - and we hear the first on air fart in the history of The Girls Uninterrupted! Brodie provides her post-marathon report and unfortunately it wasn't a good pick up spot. Caitlin fights the big fella and WINS. Gracie's body is up to all sorts of things, and she's really missing her exercise. And then we finish on poos...it's great!

item.title: Do not disturb, hash browns and a new pick up spot? | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description WOMEN'S SPORT, WOMEN'S SPORT, WOMEN'S SPORT!!!!! Brodie's off to do the Queenstown Marathon and thinks it could be an opportunity for something else... Caitlin and Gracie change Brodie's phone life for the better. Gracie can't tie her shoelaces anymore. Caitlin burnt her head. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: The Christchurch Live Show! | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We had an absolute blast on a glorious Sunday afternoon in Christchurch! Thanks to everyone who came along, we hope you had a good time, and hope everyone who wasn't there enjoys some pretty hilarious chats - including a surprise cameo from Jo Kane at the end... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Cake mix, Mariah, 3B Cream, young adult books. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Right so we're in November and we discuss whether we can start applying "f*ck it, it's Christmas" to everything... Caitlin shares an alarming fact about where she listens to Mariah's Christmas song. We're not impressed with Chrissy Teigen. Gracie's 31 weeks pregnant, had her final hypnobirthing class and needs some chafing cream. Brodie's working, running and tutu-ing. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Ye, Ants, OOS, Beans, Snoop Dogg, and The Pink Pig. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Plenty on the minutes today starting with Ye's contract with Adidas being ripped up over his antisemitic comments. Have you seen how terrifying ants are up close? We'll potentially offend the Swifties today so here's your warning... It takes a punishingly long time for Brodie to realise she was right all along with OOS. And, a story about The Pink Pig that will go down in history! See omnystudio.

item.title: The Auckland Live Show! | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Oh my goodness WHAT A NIGHT!! Thank you so much to everyone who came to the live show at Wynyard Pavilion - we had an absolute blast! Hope everyone who couldn't make it enjoys this episode, we can tell you it's quite a different feeling saying all the stuff we say with faces looking back at you but we loved every minute! Thanks to our tour Sponsors, Puma and CeraVe - we couldn't have done it without you!

item.title: Bad flatties, pottery classes, unsuccessful flirting. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We share some absolute horror stories about old flatmates - everyone's got a shocker right? Caitlin's off to pottery classes and we cannot wait to see the results. Brodie flirted and wasn't successful but hey it was still a time. Gracie's in her third trimester and about to move house so she's all bloody go! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Butter Boards, Fingering, Brats, Deep Hard n Funky | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description Another mammoth episode because quite frankly it went so many places. Has alcohol become not cool? Are butter boards the new platter? A lesson on fingering. Cailtin's got to stop calling herself a Brat... Remember Deep Hard n Funky? And some advice for a young listener tempted to travel... Plus HEAPS more! See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Anne Hathaway, dance dance doof doof and Costco. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description The girls disagree on Anne Hathaway's double movie "glow ups". They geek out and remind you how important it is to vote in the Local Government elections. But don't worry, we get back into some dancey dancey doofy doofy (lol). What you can buy at Costco and who out of us is keen to go. We get some more fascinating learnings from Gracie's hypnobirthing classes. And couples who watch porn together.

item.title: Hymns, Adam Levine, baby names and rib boobs. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description BUSY MEETING TONIGHT!! We learn all about the "hymns" Caitlin used to sing. We dissect the Adam Levine cheating scandal. Baby names and pregnancy models. Rib boobs are cool. Handmaid's Tale arguments. And, we learn about "Floppy Face, Floppy Fanny". See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information. Transcript

item.title: Grey hair, Cruise Ships and ballet flats. | The Girls Uninterrupted
item.description: Podcast Description We talk about whether you have to "embrace" grey hair or not... Would you go on a Cruise? Ballet flats are apparently making a comeback, and none of us are here for it. Gracie reports back from Sydney, Caitlin is about to graduate and Brodie is a day away from moving house so she's all go! And a really tricky listener question about career vs love... See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
